name: Slim Fit Sports joggers

name: Suit trousers Slim Fit
description: Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
composition: Shell: Polyester 64%, Viscose 34%, Elastane 2%Pocket lining: Polyester 91%, Cotton 9%

name: Regular Fit Cropped joggers
